deployment.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo "Starting deployment through VPN tunnel..."
echo "Tunnel Host: $TUNNEL_HOST"
echo "Tunnel Port: $TUNNEL_PORT"
echo "Target Host: $TARGET_HOST"
echo "Target Port: $TARGET_PORT"

# Use SSH through tunnel to deploy
if [ ! -z "$TUNNEL_PORT" ]; then
    echo "Using tunnel connection..."
    ssh -p $TUNNEL_PORT $TARGET_USER@$TUNNEL_HOST "hostname && uptime && docker ps"
else
    echo "Using direct connection..."
    ssh $TARGET_USER@$TARGET_HOST "hostname && uptime && docker ps"
fi

echo "Deployment completed!"
